segments.text: I look at the scene and feel a pang for what's coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her routine, unaware of the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows endlessly from the faucet, flooding the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over, drenching the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is wet now, but she keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously on the tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One slip, and he'll crash down with cookies flying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, full of hope, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar tempts them, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden blooms peacefully, untouched by this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a world without worries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see hazards ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR
